attributes.action: stop the new vaping laws that are coming in may 2017
attributes.additional_details:
Here are the new laws and penalties.

E-liquid containers can not exceed 10ml.
this will increase e liquid cost.

Maximum nicotine strength of 20mg.
24mg was a common strength to help initially kick the heavy smoking habit of cigarettes.

Maximum tank capacity of 2ml.
Expect to be refilling them much more often and a massive reduction of product choice.

Here are the penalties.
if you do not comply you could face imprisonment of up to two years and/or an unlimited fine.
attributes.background: the new laws that are going to be effecting e-cig users and retailers of e-cigs and e-liquids are ludicrous which in turn will increase costs on all e-liquids and devices. But by may 2017 many will not be able to use their devices as it gose againts the new laws with ridiculous penalties.
